description:
Revised solo according to Carl Brown's breakdown of the solo (https://youtu.be/TPQQd3L-boI?feature=shared&t=425) & live recordings. All notes & timing unchanged except for an added double-stop; these changes mostly move the notes at the beginning of the solo down a string.
(via editor)
title: The Number Of The Beast

description:
Updated Dave's solo to use the proper strings (notes and rhythm unchanged). Used performance videos & Carl Brown's solo lesson as a reference.
